definitions.definition: The sixth day of the week in many religious traditions, and the fifth day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm; the Muslim Sabbath ; it follows Thursday and precedes Saturday .
The last workday in a work schedule that is not Monday through Friday.
examples: Tomorrow's Thursday, but I have Friday and Saturday off, so really it's my Friday .

main_definition: The sixth day of the week in many religious traditions, and the fifth day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm; the Muslim Sabbath ; it follows Thursday and precedes Saturday .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial, with possessive ) The last workday in a work schedule that is not Monday through Friday.
